name: Romin Irani
bio: Romin works as a Developer Advocate at Google. He has over 25+ years of experience in the software industry and lives in Mumbai, India.

name: Anurag Agrawal
bio: An entrepreneur and a technology leader, with a proven track record of new technology introduction and digital transformation projects. Passionate about exploring new domains, new challenges and building teams and software to solve real world problems.

name: Devashish Nyati
bio: Hello, I’m Devashish Nyati, a passionate software engineer and tech entrepreneur with a thirst for innovation and a love for technology. My journey has been marked by remarkable experiences, and I am excited to share a glimpse of it with you.

name: Himanshu Ramchandani
bio: Helping businesses Build AI products • Helping Industry Leaders 10x their AI expertise • Documenting the process.

name: Nirav Kothari
bio: Working as Solution Architect having 19+ years of experience in the areas of Data Engineering, data science, IoT, RPA, Integration tools etc.

name: Sharmistha Chatterjee

company.designation: Head of Advanced Analytics Chapter Area
company.name: Commonwealth Bank of Australia

bio: Sharmistha Chatterjee is an evangelist and seasoned professional in ML and cloud applications. She is working as the Head of Advanced Analytics Systems and Platforms Chapter Area in Chief Data and Analytics Office at the Commonwealth Bank of Australia, where she has been instrumental in setting up the practise from scratch. She currently leads the practise, building scalable ML and decisioning platforms.

name: Karan Mittal
bio: I am passionate about building solutions with Data Science and Technology. With the amount of data available, more and more solutions are needed to handle and churn effective value from it. Data Science makes those smart solutions possible, which we were only able to imagine a couple of years ago.

name: Sunil Kumar
bio: I love to teach machines and make them more humanized. I design and develop technical solutions using Generative AI, LLMs, Deep Learning and Robotics for various industrial sectors, primarily focusing on Natural Language Understanding, Computer vision & Conversational AI.

name: Murari Ramuka
bio: Murari has extensively worked on Traditional and Modern data platforms having deep experience in Data Management, Data Architecture, Data Engineering, Data Science, Data Governance etc. In his past experiences at Microsoft, KPMG and HSBC, he led cloud data strategy/ implementation for multiple enterprise customers.

name: Adeen Shukla
bio: With a background in web and mobile app development, Adeen started in tech communities, quickly becoming known for his expertise and active involvement.
